sections.heading: of interpretation.The Uniform Controlled Substances Act shall be so applied and construed as to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the law with respect to the subject of the act among those states which enact it
sections.text: SourceLaws 1977, LB 38, ยง 97;Laws 2001, LB 113, ยง 16.

28-437.Uniformity of interpretation.

The Uniform Controlled Substances Act shall be so applied and construed as to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the law with respect to the subject of the act among those states which enact it.

SourceLaws 1977, LB 38, ยง 97;Laws 2001, LB 113, ยง 16.
